article.headline: Buffalo 78, Eastern Michigan 62
article.story: AMHERST, N.Y. (AP) -- Calvin Cage had 20 points to help lift Buffalo to a 78-62 win over Eastern Michigan in the conference opener for both teams on Wednesday night. Buffalo (11-1, 1-0 Mid-American Conference) has won nine straight and is off to its best start since winning 12 of its first 13 games in 1962-63. Yassin Idbihi and Roderick Middleton contributed 17 points each for the Bulls, who have won 25 of their last 27 games at home. Danny McElhinny had 17 points to lead Eastern Michigan (3-6, 0-1), which lost for the second straight game. Up 20-19 with 7 minutes to go in the first half, the Bulls went on a 29-6 run to give them a 49-25 edge at halftime. Buffalo shot a blistering 66 percent from the floor during the first 20 minutes, including hitting 8-of-11 from beyond the arc. The Bulls extended their lead to 28 points just 3 minutes into the second half before the Eagles were able to trim the lead to 67-51 with under 5 minutes to play. Buffalo has beaten Eastern Michigan in six of the last eight meetings between the two teams. John Bowler added 12 points for the Eagles, who have lost all four of their games on the road this season.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
